how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: Stake with us and help the Amazon! We are the only pool hosted physically on the Amazon rain-forest. Aid forest protection and help needy living along the Amazon River by 10% of profit destined to local projects. Check our website.
about.server: Brazilian Amazon Forest hosted servers feeded by clean energy
